creator: BP Board Games
descriptionHtml:
Our game offers premium backgammon with its 18 variants of the backgammon game! This fun and free game lets you enjoy one of the world’s most popular strategy games with friends you already know or people you meet online.

Challenge yourself and others to master the backgammon rules with some of the most popular board games that has ever existed!

The Best Features of our Backgammon game:

● includes 18 games
You can play 18 Backgammon games (Backgammon,Табла, Mahbusa, Tabla, Portes,Tawla31 ( طاولة زهر ),十五子棋 , Long Backgamon,Tavla, Tavli , Длинные нарды, Gamão, Nərd, Fevga, Moultezim ), Tapa ( Plakoto ), Narde, Nackgammon,Takhteh,Shesh besh, Moultezim,Gioul, Old English Backgammon, The pin game,Plakoto express and Gul bara.

● Any kind of Multiplayer
- LAN (WiFi)
- Online multiplayer - Internet
- Local 2-player (hot-seat)
- Bluetooth

● Smaller size ~ 10MB

● Daily Challenges
Win games vs AI with exact rules and conditions each day and be the best player.

● Multi Games Tournament
Design your tournament. List which backgammon games will be played.

● One of the Best statistics
Statistics are grouped by game,year and month

● Backgammon Games DESIGNER
Design your backgammon game with custom chips starting positions.

● TRNG is embedded ( fair Backgammon dice roll ), Online Random Generator

● Google Play Game Services - Play online in real-time, chat, invite friends, auto-match with random players

Games included:
- Backgammon ( Tavla, Tabla, Tawla, Nərd, Portes, Tavli, Короткие нарды, Gamão, 十五子棋 )
- Tapa (Plakoto, Тапа, Mahbusa) game
- Gul bara ( Гюлбара ) game
- Long Backgamon - Narde ( Длинные нарды )
- Nackgammon game
- Backgammon to lose
- Race Gammon game
- Takhteh
- American Acey-Deucey
- Fevga
- Moultezim
- Gioul
- Tawla 31 game( طاولة زهر )
- The pin game
- Plakoto (Mahbusa) express
- Plakoto / Tapa 2 game
- Shesh besh game
- Old English Backgammon game
- Play Hyper Backgammon
- Fast start-up Backgammon Widget

Other features:
- Live Dice
- Advanced Backgammon AI
- AI Setup
- Undo function
- Automatic move
- Rush mode (4,5,6,7) sec
- Doubling cube
- Five themes (black,droid,classic, metal,treasure)
- Support all resolution

This game is intended for adults and does not offer real money gambling or any opportunities to win real money or prizes. Success within this game does not imply future success at real money gambling.

For Questions, Concerns, Problems and Help: Write us to bobibp@gmail.com
descriptionShort: ✰ You can play 18 variants of Backgammon game against AI,online or Bluetooth ✰

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This is a major version release:
1. Narde 6-1 is fixed
2. Online Multiplayer is rewriten form scratch (no need of Google Play Games Services)
3. Hyper Backgammon is added
4. Dutch Backgammon is added
5. Narde(Long Backgammon) 6-1 is added
6. Other minor fixes and improvements

So it may contains some bugs in the online multiplayer and new games. Please send us any bugs or concerns you have from the feedback menu in the game or at bobibp@gmail.com.

Challenge yourself and others to master the backgammon rules with some of the most popular board games that has ever existed!

The Best Features of our Backgammon Game:
● 22 Free Games are included
- Backgammon - which is also called Табла, Tawla, Nərd, Portes, Tavli, Короткие нарды, Gamão, 十五子棋 ,Gammon ,Mahbusa. It is internatinal version of the game
- Turkish Tavla played in Turkey
- Plakoto also called (Тапа, Mahbusa ) - It is popular in Bulgaria and Greece
- Gulbara called ( Гюлбара in bulgarian)
- Long Backgammon with other names like (Narde, Длинные нарды) It is very popular in Russia
- Nackgammon is like regular game but with different positions
- Trik Trak
- Backgammon to lose - You have to lose
- Race Gammon
- Takhteh
- American Acey-Deucey
- Fevga
- Moultezim
- Gioul
- Tawla 31 ( طاولة زهر )
- The pin
- Plakoto express
- Plakoto / Tapa 2
- Shesh besh
- Old English Backgammon
- Hyper Backgammon
- Dutch Backgammon
- Narde 6-1 also very popular in Russia
- Snake Backgammon - popular in Scandinavia

● Any kind of Multiplayer
- LAN (WiFi)
- Online multiplayer - Internet
- Local 2-player (hot-seat)
- Bluetooth

● Smaller size ~ 10MB

● Daily Challenges
Win games vs AI with exact rules and conditions each day and be the best player.

● Multi Games Tournament
Design your tournament. List which backgammon games will be played.

● One of the Best statistics
Statistics are grouped by game,year and month

● Backgammon Games DESIGNER
Design your backgammon game with custom chips starting positions.

● TRNG is embedded ( fair Backgammon dice roll ), Online Random Generator

● Google Play Game Services - Play online in real-time, chat, invite friends, auto-match with random players

Other features:
- Live Dice
- Advanced Backgammon AI
- AI Setup
- Undo function
- Automatic move
- Rush mode (4,5,6,7) sec
- Doubling cube
- Five themes (black,droid,classic, metal,treasure)
- Support all resolution

This game is intended for adults and does not offer real money gambling or any opportunities to win real money or prizes. Success within this game does not imply future success at real money gambling.

For Questions, Concerns, Problems and Help: Write us to bobibp@gmail.com
